ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Cameron H. McArthur **RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY ** Tax Court of Canada
PrecisRetirement and granting of a lifelong annuity to the Hon. CAMERON H. McARTHUR, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective September 22, 2011.
